content.rendered:
Narratium contains an internal system of color schemes that allow to change the colors of the site in general and also of the posts and pages.

In Appearance -> Customize -> Colors you can select the color scheme that the site will use. This scheme will be used globally throughout the site except for posts or pages where you have selected another color scheme.

In the post editing page we can find a metabox entitled “Color Scheme” from which we can select a custom color scheme for the post.
